## JsonFile.updateString() method

Serializes the specified JSON object to a string buffer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static updateString(previousJson: string, newJsonObject: JsonObject, options?: IJsonFileStringifyOptions): string;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

</td></tr>
<tr><td>

newJsonObject


</td><td>

[JsonObject](./node-core-library.jsonobject.md)


</td><td>

the object to be serialized


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[IJsonFileStringifyOptions](./node-core-library.ijsonfilestringifyoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ other settings that control serialization


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

string

a JSON string, with newlines, and indented with two spaces
